MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode areas of Pwllheli and Chwilog. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:53pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:22pm on 10th November 2020.
